Control Statement: Maintain the policies and procedures implemented to comply with this subpart in written (which may be electronic) form; and\n \t\t\t\t(ii) If an action, activity or assessment is required by this subpart to be documented, maintain a written (which may be electronic) record or the action, activity, or assessment.
